column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Rubbish piles are causing a stink along Streets 271 and 187 around the Soviet Friendship Hospital
column4: which most people call the Russian hospital. ------Some residents from nearby houses are transporting garbage and throwing it there after  Cintri trash collecting stopped for  three days.------Residents are asking the local authorities of Khan Chamkar Morn to intervene and order Cintri to come to collect the rubbish. With heavy rains and the rubbish mountain growing
column5: there are serious concerns over public health.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/705671.html
